choices.title: Reduce, Reuse, Recycle
choices.sendText: I pledge to reduce my consumption, reuse items whenever possible, and recycle to minimize waste.

choices.title: Energy Efficiency
choices.sendText: I pledge to reduce my energy consumption by using energy-efficient appliances, turning off lights when not in use, and unplugging devices

choices.title: Sustainable Transportation
choices.sendText: I pledge to use sustainable transportation methods such as biking, walking, carpooling, or using public transit in daily commute

choices.title: Support Sustainable Products
choices.sendText: I pledge to support products and companies that prioritize sustainability, including purchasing items made from recycled materials and those that are ethically produced,

choices.title: Reduce Single-Use Plastics
choices.sendText: I pledge to avoid single-use plastics by using reusable bags, bottles, and containers

choices.title: Mindful Consumption
choices.sendText: I pledge to be a mindful consumer, considering the environmental impact of my purchases and opting for quality over quantity

choices.title: Plant a Tree
choices.sendText: I pledge to plant at least one tree each year to contribute to reforestation and combat climate change

choices.title: Educate Others
choices.sendText: I pledge to educate others about the importance of trees and encourage them to participate in tree-planting initiatives.

choices.title: Reduce Paper Use
choices.sendText: I pledge to reduce my paper use and support tree free paper products to decrease deforestation
